reviews.review_text: They came packaged nicely and you get what you paid for but I love it! Honestly such a steal for them being the real thing. I got them for the gym since I'm always losing mine so it does help knowing if I lose them that I didn't waste so much üò≠! But the quality and look wise nothing wrong with them and sound quality was nice wish it could have been a little louder but that's probably a me issue.

reviews.title: Great purchase
reviews.review_text: I was a little nervous, ordering these refurbished, but they work really well. I had generation one so it's definitely a big change, but there's so much nicer. The packaging was very nice though it did come in our AirPod Pro box instead of the GEN three, but it did come with the charging cord and the case. Work great, faster delivery than expected.

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love my AirPods they are perfectly perfect. They were purchased refurbished %26 if I wouldn't have known when ordering I would have thought they were brand new!

reviews.title: Good purchase!
reviews.review_text: They have been working well so far. The only noticeable issue is the ‚Äúfind my‚Äù feature. It doesn't track the location very well. I will have it on my and it will be giving me notifications that I left it behind at the last place I used it. I supposed you could say it does its job because it causes me to ensure I have them with me.

reviews.title: Trashy
reviews.review_text: Low quality dont fit in case cant use find my it say they are 2 different airpods and they dont come with a charger

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.review_text: The left one didn't even work, didn't come in any type of box, %26 the right one made an awful sound it was so quiet in my ear but somehow people can hear it better from outside their ear terrible terrible terrible it was supposed to be ‚Äúlike new‚Äù what a waste of time %26 money i got my refund.

reviews.title: Do not buy if you don't want to send them back
reviews.review_text: Had issues connecting, unable to use them until the original owner disconnects them from their apple id account. Listen to the bad reviews on this product, very frustrating, terrible seller.
They came charge then when they died they never changed again and had them for some time waiting thinking it'll work and never did

I bought the refurbished AirPods because it was a better deal however, when I received them, I was unable to connect to them to my phone because they were still registered under the original owners account now I'm going to have to return them and try to get a different pair. Very inconvenient and embarrassing as this was a present for my son.
Still has an issue and would not connect. Had to return.

reviews.title: Apple AirPods gen 3
reviews.review_text: Working great only issue is it came with an Apple watch charger not AirPod charger . Fast shipping.
The left ear immediately stopped working, maybe it's just mine but yeah.
The volume was so low on them you couldn't hear anyone talking on them

reviews.title: Not Great
reviews.review_text: Not great. The sound doesn't work good. I have it on the highest setting every time, and still can't hear my audio.
They constantly disconnect from my phone. They charge fine and work great. They just don't stay connected all the time
Volume is low And I can hardly hear out of the right earbud. Didn't come with a block for the charger either.

reviews.title: Lying about item being out of stock
reviews.review_text: Cancelled my order because they claimed it was out of stock. I then come to the product page again and it is saying that it's currently in stock but for $11 more. Do better Walmart!
It would actually be 5 stars if it connected to my cell phone to be able to track them because if I lose them I will never find them and it will be lost money
Refurbished! should be just that Refurbished...reset. these ear pods were registered to someone else account. i tried to get them reset and assistants from Walmart or Apple.
The left ear of the is product didn't work. I would like to return it.

reviews.title: In my opinion.
reviews.review_text: The audio is quite low, really don't recommend buying the these.

reviews.title: Apple Ear Pods
reviews.review_text: Very fast delivery, item is as described!
I have not received my order yet and I have filed a complaint about it before
With dents and scratches. Dissatisfied. To return and refund
When I make a call people say I sound like im covering over the speaker.
Sound quality is bad. Left airpod is not worked well. I returned it to wallmart and got refund
Amazing quality. Connected easily to my phone. Last all day. True apple product

reviews.title: not impressed
reviews.review_text: looked very rough. i know it's refurbished but they looked pretty banged up
They work fine but i've had problems with them fitting properly in my ear

reviews.title: refurbished apple air pods ppppppp
reviews.review_text: i was hesitant to buy them, do to them being refurbished. but they work just like they are brand new.

reviews.title: Terrible don't buy
reviews.review_text: Only one of them work and it's really low don't recommend and the store said they can't help me return them .
Have not tried to use them yet as they were supposed to be a gift, but the packaging came with a sticky film over it and torn.
Been a week or so since I've received my AirPods %26 even though they're refurbished, I couldn't tell. They're working fine!

reviews.title: Refund?
reviews.review_text: They were working fine for the first two days then the sound went out in my right ear piece. It has yet to come back on.
These were supposed to be delivered on 11/27 for a birthday party. They did not arrive and I was never contacted and offered an explanation.

reviews.title: Really good Walmart, really good
reviews.review_text: Arrived on time and were great quality I night them about 6 months ago and they are still working perfectly fine. I have them in my ears right now in fact! I highly recommend getting them absolutely nothing wrong with mine. It's like they were brand new expect I got them for like $50-$100 less. Highly recommend

Dear seller, I hope you can understand that I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with my recent purchase of Apple headphones. I had high expectations when I bought it, but unfortunately, the headset I received was an old product, which made me feel very disappointed and dissatisfied. As a consumer, I believe I have the right to a brand new product and look forward to your reasonable solution to this problem. I would like you to provide one of the following two options: 1. Replacement: Please send me a new pair of Apple headphones as soon as possible, so that I can enjoy the pleasant experience of the brand new product I purchased. 2. Refund: If the replacement is not possible, I request a full refund of my purchase of headphones. I see this as just compensation for the inconvenience and disappointment I experienced during the purchase process. I believe you will understand and agree to my request. I hope you can reply and resolve this issue as soon as possible to ensure that I can enjoy the experience of using the new headset as soon as possible after purchase. If you need any additional information or documentation from me to support my complaint, please feel free to let me know. I look forward to your positive response and solution. Thank you for your cooperation!

reviews.title: Best purchase I've ever made!
reviews.review_text: I've been needing new AirPods for a while and I usually buy refurbished electronics for the price but sometimes they're just not up to par, which is a risk I'm fully aware of. These were absolutely worth every penny. The sound is phenomenal, there's no scratches or wear or any sign of them being refurbished whatsoever.

reviews.title: Trash
reviews.review_text: It came dirty it has ear wax on them, the case was scratched and dirty inside the case as well. My daughter sanitized it then she tried to connect the locating option it gave her a warning that previous owner is still connected she can not connect it and previous owner will be able to see her location. Returning it.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Got these as a gift for my wife. Have to send back as they were still paired with the iCloud account of the previous owner. I was warned by my phone that the previous owner would be able to see my location if I were to pair the AirPods to my device. Very disappointed.
I've had these about two months now and they are amazing and working wonderfully.

reviews.title: Irritating
reviews.review_text: I'm already having issues with them and have since day one.
They were a birthday gift for my daughter. She loves them.
There is a problem with voice not clear and sound like far

reviews.title: Great AirPods but no charger
reviews.review_text: Didn't come with charging cable like it said didn't come with. Box or anything just case
Very quick and fast shipping product was an excellent shape

reviews.title: Right airpod
reviews.review_text: Right AirPod stopped working after 2 days

reviews.title: Airpods
reviews.review_text: They work amazing! Received order much faster than expected.
Low sound don't fit disappointed with apple happy with wal mart delivery
Did not came with charger I message the seller and did not responded back

reviews.title: Buyer Beware
reviews.review_text: Yes, I relazie they were refurbished. However, I didn't realize the previous owner didn't remove the device from their apple account. This prevents the new owner from being able to track them if they are lost.

reviews.title: Never received
reviews.review_text: I dispute it but never got a response of what happened it happened once like two years ago but i figured out maybe due to the holidays but I can't trust it for items like this

reviews.title: Sad
reviews.review_text: They kept falling out of my ears and the last time the right one fell out. I use the tracking thing and everything and could not find it. Very disappointed that's a lot of money to throw away.

reviews.title: Great Sound
reviews.review_text: love my ear buds. they have the best quality of sound. They stay put ,never fall out. They are easy to use. qould definitely buy again if i had to and recommend this product

reviews.title: Box came empty
reviews.review_text: Box came empty and damaged. I never received replaced or money back. The seller will attempt to blame the package being stolen AFTER delivery. HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND

reviews.title: Not good already broke
reviews.review_text: I've had my AirPods less than two weeks only charged them once only use them four or five times, and the base speaker in my left. One already went out and the base speaker and the right one is cutting in and out.
I have had it for a week now and so far it has been a great experience. I would definitely recommend this product

reviews.title: Bad service
reviews.review_text: Very bad service, it took almost two weeks to arrive and they sent a different product than the one I had ordered

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review_text: I bought these hoping that they were a good company I was buying from and I was definitely pleased. Thank you.

reviews.title: Scammers
reviews.review_text: Order refurbished Gen. 3 AirPods. I received Gen 1 dirty filthy AirPods. Requested a return, no response. Stay far away.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.review_text: Just buy new ones. Mine was still plugged up to the last person %26 it said they can see my location %26 all other types of stuff

reviews.title: Not the air pods I ordered
reviews.review_text: I dislike that I was sent the AirPods 2nd generation instead of the 3 rd generation that I ordered I am not happy with my order

reviews.title: AirPods still connected
reviews.review_text: AirPods say there still connected to someone else's phone and they can still track them. Don't know how I feel about this‚Ä¶.

reviews.title: Excellent
